Palo_Alto.Allied Arts Guild:
Allied Arts Guild is a complex of artist studios, shops, restaurant, and gardens in Menlo Park, California. It is used as a venue for both public and private events.


== History ==
In 1928, wealthy art lovers Delight and Garfield Merner of Hillsborough bought 3.5 acres (14,000 m2) of land at the edge of Menlo Park in order to create a center for craft production, having been inspired by craft guilds they had seen in Europe.
